trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula uma [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Application is a class that encapsulates [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application-specific functionality, including the following: - **Application Lifetime**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: Aplicação é uma classe que encapsula [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] funcionalidades específicas da aplicação, incluindo o seguinte:- **aplicação duração**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> </xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>

trans-unit.source: - **Application-Scope Window, Property, and Resource Management**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Janela de âmbito de aplicação, propriedades e gestão de recursos**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Command-Line Parameter and Exit Code Processing**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - **Parâmetro da linha de comandos e saída código processamento**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A></xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress></xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating></xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated></xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted></xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>

trans-unit.source: Application implements the singleton pattern to provide shared access to its window, property, and resource scope services.
trans-unit.target: Aplicação implementa o padrão de singleton para fornecer acesso partilhado a respetiva janela, propriedades e os serviços de âmbito de recursos.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, only one instance of the Application class can be created per <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, apenas uma instância da classe de aplicação pode ser criada por <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: You can implement an Application using markup, markup and code-behind, or code.
trans-unit.target: Pode implementar uma aplicação utilizando o markup, marcação e code-behind ou código.

trans-unit.source: If Application is implemented with markup, whether markup or markup and code-behind, the markup file must be configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação estiver implementada com markup, se markup ou a marcação e por detrás do código, o ficheiro de marcação tem de ser configurado como um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A standalone application does not require an Application object; it is possible to implement a custom `static` entry point method (`Main`) that opens a window without creating an instance of Application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Uma aplicação autónoma não necessita de um objeto de aplicação; é possível implementar um personalizado `static` o método de ponto de entrada (`Main`) que se abre uma janela sem criar uma instância da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] require an Application object.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] necessitam de um objeto de aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Only one instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> class can be created per <xref:System.AppDomain>, to ensure shared access to a single set of application-scope window, property, and resource data.
trans-unit.target: Apenas uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Application>classe pode ser criada por <xref:System.AppDomain>, para garantir acesso partilhado para um único conjunto de dados de janela, propriedades e recursos de âmbito de aplicação.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the default constructor of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> class detects whether the instance being initialized is the first instance in an <xref:System.AppDomain>; if it is not, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, o construtor predefinido da <xref:System.Windows.Application>classe Deteta se a instância a ser inicializada é a primeira instância num <xref:System.AppDomain>; se não, é um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>é emitida.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Application> object for the current <xref:System.AppDomain> is exposed from the static <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto para o atual <xref:System.AppDomain>está exposta a partir de estática <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: More than one instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> class is created per <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mais do que uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> classe é criada por <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma aplicação torna-se a aplicação de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has one or more open windows is activated (becomes the foreground application) when one of the windows is activated for the first time since the application was launched, or when one of the windows is activated while the application is inactive: Specifically, activation occurs when: - An application opens its first window.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] aplicação que tem um ou mais windows abertas está ativada (torna-se a aplicação de primeiro plano) quando uma das janelas da é ativada pela primeira vez, uma vez que a aplicação foi lançada, ou quando um do windows está ativado enquanto a aplicação está inativa: especificamente, ocorre a ativação quando:-uma aplicação abre-se a primeira janela.

trans-unit.source: - A user switches to the application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: -Um utilizador muda para a aplicação utilizando ALT + TAB ou utilizando o Gestor de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: - A user clicks the taskbar button for one of the windows in an application.
trans-unit.target: -Um utilizador clica no botão de barra de tarefas para uma das janelas numa aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to detect when they activate can handle the Activated event.
trans-unit.target: Aplicações que precisem de detetar quando que ativam podem processar o evento de ativado.

trans-unit.source: After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Depois de uma aplicação é ativada pela primeira vez, podem ser desativado e reativado demasiadas vezes durante o período de vida.

trans-unit.source: If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both Activated and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated> events to determine which activation state it's in.
trans-unit.target: Se o comportamento de uma aplicação ou estado depende do Estado de ativação, pode processar ativado e <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>eventos para determinar que a ativação do suplemento de estado</xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>

trans-unit.source: Once an application becomes active, Activated will not be raised again until the application is deactivated, irrespective of how many windows within an application are activated while the application is active.
trans-unit.target: Depois de uma aplicação fica ativa, ativado não será gerado novamente até que a aplicação ter sido desativada, independentemente de quantas windows numa aplicação são ativados enquanto a aplicação está ativa.

trans-unit.source: Activated is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Ativado não é gerado para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> objeto para o atual <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application> is a per-<xref:System.AppDomain> singleton type that implements the static Current property to provide shared access to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> instance for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application>é um por-<xref:System.AppDomain> tipo singleton que implementa a propriedade atual estática para fornecer acesso partilhado para a <xref:System.Windows.Application>instância para o atual <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.AppDomain></xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This design guarantees that state managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, including shared resources and state, is available from a single, shared location.
trans-unit.target: Esta estrutura garante que esse estado gerido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Application>, incluindo o estado e de recursos partilhados, está disponível a partir de uma localização única e partilhada.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é seguros para threads e está disponível a partir de qualquer thread.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> objeto para o atual <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma aplicação deixa de ser a aplicação de primeiro plano.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has one or more open windows deactivates (stops being the foreground application) when a user does the following: - Switches to another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] aplicação que tem um ou mais windows abertas desativa (deixa de ser a aplicação de primeiro plano) quando um utilizador faz o seguinte:-muda para outra aplicação utilizando ALT + TAB ou utilizando o Gestor de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: - Clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application.
trans-unit.target: -Clica no botão de barra de tarefas para uma janela de outra aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to detect deactivation can handle the Deactivated event.
trans-unit.target: Aplicações que precisem de desativação de detetar podem processar o evento de desativado.

trans-unit.source: After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Depois de uma aplicação é ativada pela primeira vez, podem ser desativado e reativado demasiadas vezes durante o período de vida.

trans-unit.source: If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both Deactivated and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated> events to determine which state it's in.
trans-unit.target: Se o comportamento de uma aplicação ou estado depende do Estado de ativação, pode processar ambas desativado e <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>eventos para determinar quais estipulam é suplemento</xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>

trans-unit.source: Deactivated is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Desativado não é gerado para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma exceção é emitida por uma aplicação, mas não processada.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] catches unhandled exceptions, notifies users of the exception from a dialog box (from which they can report the exception), and automatically shuts down an application.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] intercete exceções não processadas, notifica os utilizadores da exceção de uma caixa de diálogo (partir do qual se podem reportar a exceção) e uma aplicação será automaticamente encerrado.

trans-unit.source: However, if an application needs to perform custom unhandled exception processing from a centralized location, you should handle DispatcherUnhandledException.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se uma aplicação precisa de realizar uma excepção não processada personalizada de processamento de uma localização centralizada, deve processar DispatcherUnhandledException.

trans-unit.source: DispatcherUnhandledException is raised by an <xref:System.Windows.Application> for each exception that is unhandled by code running on the main UI thread.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherUnhandledException é gerado por um <xref:System.Windows.Application>para cada exceção que não é tratada pelo código em execução no thread de IU principal.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is not handled on either a background [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread (a thread with its own <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>) or a background worker thread (a thread without a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>), the exception is not forwarded to the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção não é tratada num fundo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread (um thread com a sua própria <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>) ou um thread de trabalho em segundo plano (um thread sem um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>), a exceção não seja reencaminhada para o principal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, DispatcherUnhandledException is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, DispatcherUnhandledException não é gerado.

trans-unit.source: In these circumstances, you will need to write code to do the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: Nestas circunstâncias, terá de escrever código para fazer o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: Handle exceptions on the background thread.
trans-unit.target: Lidar com exceções no thread em segundo plano.

trans-unit.source: Dispatch those exceptions to the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Emitir essas exceções para o principal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.

trans-unit.source: Rethrow them on the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread without handling them to allow DispatcherUnhandledException to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Rethrow-los no principal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread sem processamento-las para permitir DispatcherUnhandledException ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Threading Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [modelo de thread](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) descrição geral.

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherUnhandledException event handler is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs> argument that contains contextual information regarding the exception, including: - The exception (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>).
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos DispatcherUnhandledException foi transmitido um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>argumento que contém a nível contextual das informações sobre a exceção, incluindo:-a exceção (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> from which it originated (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A>).
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>do que teve origem (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information to determine whether an exception is recoverable or not.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar estas informações para determinar se uma exceção recuperável ou não.

trans-unit.source: A recoverable exception might be a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>, for example, while an unrecoverable exception might be a <xref:System.StackOverflowException>, for example.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção recuperável poderá ser um <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>, por exemplo, durante a uma exceção irrecuperável poderá ser um <xref:System.StackOverflowException>, por exemplo.</xref:System.StackOverflowException> </xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: When you process an unhandled exception from DispatcherUnhandledException, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to continue processing it, you need to set the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ao processar uma exceção não processada de DispatcherUnhandledException e não quiser [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para continuar a processá-lo, tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other events that <xref:System.Windows.Application> raises, DispatcherUnhandledException does not have a matching protected virtual implementation (OnDispatcherUnhandledException).
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário de outros eventos que <xref:System.Windows.Application>gera, DispatcherUnhandledException não tem uma implementação de virtual protegida (OnDispatcherUnhandledException) correspondente.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Application> must always register an event handler with DispatcherUnhandledException to process unhandled exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, as classes que derivar <xref:System.Windows.Application>tem sempre de registar um processador de eventos DispatcherUnhandledException processar exceções não processadas.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before an application shuts down, and cannot be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre imediatamente antes de uma aplicação será encerrado e não pode ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: An application can shut down for either of the following reasons: - The <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object is called, either explicitly or as determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma aplicação pode encerrar para qualquer uma das seguintes razões: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>método do <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto é denominado, explicitamente ou conforme determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The user ends the session by logging off or shutting down.
trans-unit.target: -O utilizador termina a sessão por terminar sessão ou encerrar.

trans-unit.source: You can detect when application shutdown occurs by handling the Exit event, and perform any additional processing as required.
trans-unit.target: Pode detetar encerramento da aplicação caso ao processar o evento de saída e efetuar qualquer processamento adicional conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: You can also handle Exit to inspect or change the application exit code when you don't need to call <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Também pode processar saída inspecionar ou alterar o código de saída da aplicação quando não precisa de chamar <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>explicitamente.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exit code is exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs> argument that's passed to the Exit event handler.
trans-unit.target: O código de saída está exposto a partir de <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs>argumento que é transferido para o processador de eventos de saída.</xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the application stops running, the exit code is passed to the operating system for subsequent processing.
trans-unit.target: Quando a aplicação deixa de ser executada, o código de saída é passado para o sistema operativo para o processamento subsequente.

trans-unit.source: If your application handles the <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> event and subsequently cancels it, Exit is not raised and the application continues running in accordance with the shutdown mode.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação processa a <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>eventos e subsequentemente cancela-lo, saída não é gerado e a aplicação continua em execução no accordance com o modo de encerramento.</xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>

trans-unit.source: The exit code can be set from an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], although the value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: O código de saída pode ser definido um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], embora o valor é ignorado.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], Exit is raised in the following circumstances: - An [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is navigated away from.
trans-unit.target: Para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], saída é gerada nas seguintes circunstâncias: - um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] é direcionado away do.

trans-unit.source: - In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], when the tab that is hosting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is closed.
trans-unit.target: -No [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], quando o separador que está a alojar o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] está fechado.

trans-unit.source: - When the browser is closed.
trans-unit.target: -Quando o browser é fechado.

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Em todos os casos, o valor da <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>propriedade é ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Searches for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] resource, such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>, with the specified key, and throws an exception if the requested resource is not found (see [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Procura um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] recursos, tais como um <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>, com o nome da chave e gera uma exceção se o recurso pedido não foi encontrado (consulte [XAML recursos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: FindResource will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro terá um aspeto FindResource em recursos de âmbito de aplicação para o recurso especificado.

trans-unit.source: Application-scope resources are managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, and are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Recursos de âmbito de aplicação são geridos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Application>e exposta a partir de <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, FindResource then next searches the system resources.
trans-unit.target: Se o recurso especificado não foi encontrado no conjunto de recursos de âmbito de aplicação, FindResource, em seguida, em seguida procura recursos do sistema.

trans-unit.source: System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations.
trans-unit.target: Recursos do sistema são shell definido pelo utilizador e incluem as cores, tipos de letra e configurações de shell.

trans-unit.source: These are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> types, respectively, as static properties.
trans-unit.target: Estes são expostas a partir de <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, e <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters>tipos, respetivamente, como as propriedades estáticas.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> </xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts> </xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: To use FindResource to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to FindResource; for example, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar FindResource para adquiri-los, estes tipos também expõem as propriedades de chave de recurso que foram concebidas para transmitir ao FindResource; Por exemplo, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because FindResource returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found.
trans-unit.target: Porque FindResource devolve um objeto, tem de converter o valor devolvido para o tipo apropriado se não for encontrado o recurso.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Se chamar este método para uma chave que não é possível encontrar, é emitida uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling FindResource, call <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> instead; <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> returns a `null` reference when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se não pretender lidar com exceções que resultam da chamada FindResource, chamar <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>em vez disso; <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>devolve um `null` quando um recurso pedido não é possível localizar e não acionar uma excepção de referência.</xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Este método é seguros para threads e pode ser chamado a partir de qualquer thread.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome do recurso para localizar.

trans-unit.source: The requested resource object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de recurso pedido.

trans-unit.source: If the requested resource is not found, a <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se o recurso pedido não for encontrado, um <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"> </xref> é emitida.

trans-unit.source: The resource cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível localizar o recurso.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a navigator in the application begins navigation to a content fragment, Navigation occurs immediately if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um navegador na aplicação começa navegação a um fragmento do conteúdo, navegação imediatamente ocorre se o fragmento pretendido é o conteúdo atual, ou após a origem [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] conteúdo foi carregado o fragmento pretendido esteja no conteúdo diferente.

trans-unit.source: A navigator is either a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: Um navegador é um um <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>ou um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>que é transmitido a GetContentStream é absoluto <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> </xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cookie for the location specified by a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um cookie para a localização especificada pela <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: GetCookie retrieves a cookie for the specified <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: GetCookie obtém um cookie para o <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> especificado

trans-unit.source: If the cookie can't be retrieved, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Se não é possível obter o cookie, um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>é emitida.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>

trans-unit.source: You need to write the code to parse the cookie string into a list of name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Terá de escrever o código para analisar a cadeia de cookie numa lista de pares nome/valor.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição geral de cookies [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], consulte [descrição geral de navegação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the location for which a cookie was created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>que especifica a localização para a qual foi criado um cookie.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value, if the cookie exists; otherwise, a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>valor, se existir o cookie; caso contrário, um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"> </xref> é emitida.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] error is raised by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetGetCookie" name="InternetGetCookie" href=""></xref> function (called by GetCookie) if a problem occurs when attempting to retrieve the specified cookie.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] erro ser gerado pelo <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetGetCookie" name="InternetGetCookie" href=""> </xref> função (chamada pelo GetCookie) se ocorrer um problema ao tentar obter o cookie especificado.

trans-unit.source: MainWindow is automatically set with a reference to the first <xref:System.Windows.Window> object to be instantiated in the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: MainWindow é automaticamente definido com uma referência ao <xref:System.Windows.Window>objeto a ser instanciado no <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Window> primeiro

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different main window by setting MainWindow assigning another <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> object to the MainWindow property.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar uma janela principal diferente, definindo MainWindow atribuir outro <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>objeto para a propriedade MainWindow.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object is set to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, closing the main window causes the application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto está definido como <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, fechar a janela principal faz com que a aplicação encerrar.</xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to set the MainWindow property from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], if an application's main window is not the window that is produced by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: É possível definir a propriedade MainWindow de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], se a janela principal de uma aplicação não é a janela de que é produzida por definir a <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>propriedade no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two limitations of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approach are: - You can specify either a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only <xref:System.Windows.Window> or a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the main window.
trans-unit.target: As limitações de duas a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] abordagem são:-pode especificar um um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-apenas <xref:System.Windows.Window>ou um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-apenas <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>como a janela principal.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: - You must set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of the window you specify, otherwise it won't be shown.
trans-unit.target: -Tem de definir o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>propriedade da janela tem de especificar, caso contrário, não será apresentado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reference to the first <xref:System.Windows.Window> object to be instantiated is also added as the first item to the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: A referência do primeiro <xref:System.Windows.Window>o objeto a ser instanciado também é adicionado como o primeiro item para o <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: If MainWindow is subsequently set with a reference to a different <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the position of the item with the reference to the main window will change, while the order of items in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> remains the same.
trans-unit.target: Se MainWindow subsequentemente está definida com uma referência a outro <xref:System.Windows.Window>, irá alterar a posição do item com a referência para a janela principal, enquanto a ordem dos itens no <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>permanece igual.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, always use MainWindow to refer to the main window instead of the first item in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Por conseguinte, utilize sempre MainWindow referir-se a janela principal em vez do primeiro item na <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the main window is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and you need specific access to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> members, you will need to cast the value of MainWindow to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se a janela principal é uma <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, e terá acesso específico aos <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>Membros, terá de converter o valor de MainWindow para <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: > > This property is available only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: >> Esta propriedade está disponível apenas a partir do thread que criou o <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> that is designated as the main application window.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> que está designado como a janela principal da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: MainWindow is set from an application that's hosted in a browser, such as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: MainWindow está definida a partir de uma aplicação que está alojada num browser, tais como um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
